statements: UPDATE sensor_data SET temperature = 25.5 WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE sensor_data SET humidity = 60.2 WHERE id = '223e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
UPDATE sensor_data SET temperature = 22.8, humidity = 55.0 WHERE id = '323e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174002';
UPDATE sensor_data SET temperature = 25.5, humidity = 50.3 WHERE id = 'f67a22e1-ee0f-4c7b-8e4b-242d6ea4665d';
UPDATE sensor_data SET temperature = temperature + 2, humidity = humidity - 5 WHERE temperature > 30 AND humidity < 60;
UPDATE sensor_data SET temperature = CASE WHEN temperature < 20 THEN 20 WHEN temperature > 30 THEN 30 ELSE temperature END, humidity = CASE WHEN humidity < 40 THEN humidity + 10 ELSE humidity END;
UPDATE temperatures SET temperature = 25.5 WHERE sensor_id = 1
UPDATE humidities SET humidity = 60.2 WHERE sensor_id = 2
UPDATE temperatures SET temperature = 22.8 WHERE sensor_id = 3
UPDATE temperatures SET temperature = temperature + 1 WHERE sensor_id = 1;
UPDATE humidities SET humidity = humidity * 0.5 WHERE sensor_id = 2;
UPDATE temperatures t1 INNER JOIN humidities h1 ON t1.sensor_id = h1.sensor_id SET t1.temperature = t1.temperature + h1.humidity WHERE t1.sensor_id = 3;
